title: Roadcraft
creator_credit: Greg Reading, Elisabeth Knight and Film Australia
brief_description: Australian mime and comic Jean-Paul Bell features in this light-hearted filmic look at a serious subject: how to drive in order to prevent collisions. This film is aimed at the more experienced driver as well as the novice. Narrated by Graeme Blundell.
creator_credit_for_label: Greg Reading, Elisabeth Knight and Film Australia
